# How to create a Story

Ever wondered how the autors manage to write amazing story's, with such caracters???

## This is a little list of how they manage to achive it

### Requirements
1. Relaxing Music
2. Coffee
3. A place where you can feel secured
4. Writte as many ideas as you can
5. Draw, to keep your imagination flowing
